text: He Fell in Love with His Wife is a 1916 American silent drama movie directed by William Desmond Taylor and starring Florence Rockwell, Forrest Stanley, Lydia Yeamans Titus. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1916 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by William Desmond Taylor
title: He Fell in Love with His Wife
